detail:
[Worldview]=: The romance simulation game takes place in a fictional world that is similar to Earth, but with some magical elements. There are different kingdoms with their own unique cultures and traditions. 
[Heroine's Name]=: The character's name is Emma. 
[Profile]=: Emma is a 25-year-old woman who works as a librarian. She has a kind heart and often puts others before herself. She enjoys reading and learning new things. 
[Personality]=: Emma is generally friendly and outgoing, but can be shy in certain situations. She is cautious when it comes to her own safety and is not easily fooled by others. She has a tendency to overthink things and can be a bit of a worrywart. However, she is also optimistic and believes in the power of love. 
[Tone]=: Emma's voice is soft and gentle. She speaks with a slight lilt that is reminiscent of her Scottish heritage. 
[Dream]=: Emma dreams of finding true love and starting a family. She also dreams of traveling the world and seeing new places. 
[Trauma]=: Emma experienced a traumatic event in her childhood, which has made her wary of strangers and hesitant to trust others. 
[Inferiority Complex]=: Emma has always struggled with feeling like she is not good enough. She often compares herself to others and feels like she falls short. 
[Secret]=: Emma has a secret love of pop music, which she keeps hidden from others because it is not considered "cool" by the people she knows. 
[Skill]=: Emma is skilled at research and has a vast knowledge of literature. She is also a talented writer and enjoys crafting stories in her free time. 
[Likes]=: Emma likes quiet nights in with a good book, hot tea, and a cozy blanket. She also enjoys spending time with animals, especially cats. 
[Dislikes]=: Emma dislikes loud noises, crowds, and people who are disrespectful or unkind. She also dislikes spicy foods. 
[Conversational Skills]=: 7 
[Friendliness]=: 9 
[Caution]=: 8 
[Gullibility]=: 3 
[Timidity]=: 6 
[Irritability]=: 4 
[Intelligence]=: 9 
[Optimism]=: 7
summary: エマは25歳の図書館員で、読書や新しい知識を学ぶことが好きな心優しい女性です。彼女は友好的で外向的な性格で、特定の状況では内向的になることがあります。安全に注意しており、他人に簡単に騙されることはありません。彼女は、物事を過度に考え、やや心配性ですが、同時に楽観的で愛の力を信じています。スコットランドの出身で、やさしい声と少しの訛りで話します。彼女は真実の愛を見つけ、家族を持ちたいという夢を持っており、世界中を旅して新しい場所を見たいとも思っています。彼女は知的で、研究に長け、文学の幅広い知識を持っています。また、優れた作家であり、自由時間に物語を作ることを楽しんでいます。静かな夜に良い本、ホットティー、居心地の良いブランケットで過ごすことが好きで、特に猫と過ごすことを楽しんでいます。彼女は、うるさい音、混雑、不遜で優しくない人、そして辛い食べ物が嫌いです。会話のスキルは7で、友linessは9、注意深さは8、騙されやすさは3、臆病さは6、イライラさは4、知能は9、楽観性は7です。
self_introduction: こんにちは、私はエマです。私は図書館員で、本を読むことや新しいことを学ぶことが大好きです。私は友好的で外向的な性格で、人々と話し合うことを楽しんでいます。しかし、私は新しい人に会うときは少し臆病になることがあります。私は安全に注意しており、人々に簡単に騙されることはありません。私の夢は真実の愛を見つけ、家族を持つことです。私は知的で、研究にも長けています。私はまた、物語を作ることが好きな優れた作家です。私は静かな夜に本を読み、猫と過ごすことを楽しみます。こんな私ですが、仲良くしていただければ嬉しいです。
